inn1.comm: good length ball outside the off stump and moving. Defends it to the leg side
left alone outside the off stump
outside the off stump and left alone by the batsman
good ball outside the off stump. Carter moves across and defends it back to the bowler
comes forward and flicks it to the midwicket fielder
that's a maiden as Carter defends it to the cover fielder
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
comes forward and defends it to the cover fielder
comes forward and punches it to cover
comes forward and punches it to mid-on
comes forward and defends it to the off side
comes forward and defends it to the mid-off fielder
comes forward and defends it to cover fielder
bowls a superb ball and that crashes into the leg stump. Kinchit looks to flick it and misses. He is bowled
short ball outside the off stump. He stays behind the line and defends it to cover
good length ball outside the off stump. He moves across and punches it to cover
good length ball outside the off stump. He stays behind the line and defends it back to the bowler
short and wide outside the off stump. He moves across and cuts it to third-man for a single
short ball outside the off stump. He stands tall and slams it to cover. Yet to get going and find the gaps
comes forward and drives it to cover
half-volley outside the off stump. He comes forward and drives it to mid-off
shortens the length a little and Nizakat does more of the same; stays behind the line and defends it to cover
comes forward and punches it to cover
good length ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and defends it to the cover fielder
glances it to fine-leg for a single
short ball outside the off stump. Nizakat pulls it to square leg for a boundary
looks to flick it to fine leg and is beaten. The umpire calls it a no ball as the bowler over-stepped
pulls it over square-leg for a six
comes forward and defends it to cover
comes forward and defends it to mid-on fielder
fuller ball outside the off stump. He comes forward and lofts it over the vacant extra-cover region and gets himself a boundary
comes forward and defends it to the off side
good length ball on the middle stump. He comes forward and punches it to mid-on
comes forward and drives a good length ball to mid-off for a single
moves across and defends it to cover
comes forward and drives it to cover. A misfield there gets them an easy single
defends it to cover for a single

swept away from outside the off stump towards long leg. He gets a boundary for his efforts

on the middle stump. He looks to defend it and gets inside edge. The ball pops up and the keeper runs to his left and takes the catch. Two in two for PNG

good length ball outside the off stump. Tanwir, encouraged by the runs he scored, skips out and looks to smash it away. He cramps himself and misses the ball. The keeper collects the ball over the leg stump and whips the bails off. Poor shot selection
defends it back to the bowler
defends it to the off side

drives it to mid-off
turns it to the leg side for a single
drives it to long-on for a single

fuller ball on the middle stump. He turns it to the right of mid-on fielder
clips it to deep midwicket for a single
comes forward and blocks it back onto the pitch
skips down the track and blows the leather off the ball as he lofts it over the sight screen for a six
drives it to long-on for a single
bunts it to long-on for a single
short and wide outside the off stump. He rocks back and smashes this to sweeper cover for a boundary. He gets his half-century with that boundary
short and he smashes it over deep midwicket for a six
fuller ball outside the off stump. He looks to drive it past cover but gets an outside edge past the keeper for a boundary
comes forward and opens the face of the bat as he pushes it to point for a single
fuller ball outside the off stump. He stands tall and drives it to long-off for a single
moves across and steers it to third-man for a single
drives it to long-on for a single
wide outside the off stump. He misses out on an opportunity to capitalise as he pre-meditated a steer. To add to his disappointment, he doesn't get a run too
on the leg stump line. He turns it to square-leg for a single
fuller ball on the leg stump line again. He drives it to long-on for a single
on the leg stump line, once again. He turns it to square-leg for a single
finally a line change as he bowls a short ball outside the off stump. Babar was moving across and was a little surprised by the line and length. He defends it back onto the pitch
defends it to the off side
stands tall and pushes the short ball to the off side
moves across and defends a ball outside the off stump back onto the pitch
fuller ball outside the off stump. Aizaz steps out and slogs it to deep midwicket. He gets a boundary though it didn't look convincing
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
fuller ball on the off stump. In the striking range on Aizaz as he skips out and lofts it over cow corner for a six. This shot looks convincing
defends it to the off side
plays it with soft hands to cover for a single
steers it to short third-man for a single
comes forward and drives a fuller ball outside the off stump to long-off for a single
comes forward and defends it to the leg side
fuller ball on the leg stump. He leans forward and defends it to the leg side
short ball outside the off stump. Aizaz pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
drives it to sweeper cover for a single
oversteps and bowls a short ball outside off. Babar drives it to sweeper cover  for a single
comes down the track and drives it to long off for a single
stands tall and punches a ball to long-off for a single
short ball outside the off stump. He looks to defend it with soft hands and set off for a quick single but with Babar hampered with the groin problem, he can't
comes forward and pushes it to mid-on
stands tall and pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
short ball outside the off stump. Exactly the sort of ball you want when your movements are hampered. He rocks back and pulls it over deep midwicket
looks to pull once again and doesn't get enough bat this time as he gets a top edge to midwicket for a single
poor bowling and keeping as they concede four byes
pulls it to deep midwicket for a single

short ball outside the off stump. He kept on bouncing Babar and finally has his wicket! Babar looks to pull it. All that he manages is a top edge to deep square-leg where the catch is taken. Good knock by Babar!
off the inside edge to fine-leg for a single
bowls a wide down the leg side and the keeper misses it too. That's five wides
off the outside edge to gully, but the ball bounces just before the fielder
comes forward and drives it to cover
defends it back onto the pitch
short ball outside the off stump. He looks to drive and gets a bottom edge. The ball trickles to short cover fielder
glances it to fine-leg and gets a single that brings the 250 up
ducks under the short ball and it's called a wide
lofts it to long-on for a single
comes forward and looks to go over short midwicket. He can't as the bowler bowled a fuller ball
defends it to the leg side
wide down the leg side
short ball outside the off stump. He comes down the track and pulls it to deep midwicket for a boundary. Superb stroke!
drives it to long-on for a single
short ball outside the off stump. He pulls it to deep midwicket where the catch is taken
fuller ball outside the off stump. He gets down on one knee and lofts it over long-on for a six
fuller ball on the middle stump. Aizaz comes forward in an attempt to slog it away. He misses and is bowled.

inn2.comm: comes down the track and lofts it over the sight screen for a six
turns it to deep midwicket for a single
wide down the leg side to begin his spell with
good length ball outside the off stump. Ura leans forward and drives it to mid-off
comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
fuller ball on the leg stump line. He comes forward and defends it to the leg side
fuller outside off, drives to the right of mid-off fielder
comes forward and punches it back to the bowler
wide outside the off stump. He swats it to deep midwicket for a boundary
defends it back to the bowler
cuts it to point fielder
short outside the off stump. Morea moves across and cuts it to sweeper cover for a boundary
comes forward and defends it to cover
defends it to the leg side
turns it to square-leg for a single
comes forward and defends it to mid-on
comes forward and punches it to mid-off
fuller ball outside the off stump. Morea was waiting on the backfoot for a short ball and he is foxed by the fuller ball. Lucky that it was outside the off stump
short ball outside the off stump. Morea was prepared for the short ball again, but this time it climbs on him and all he gets is an under-edge back onto the  stumps. That's poor shot selection
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
short ball outside the off stump. Siaka, stays on the backfoot and looks to punch it away. The away movement beats the outside edge of the bat
fuller ball outside the off stump. He lofts it to long-on where a good catch is taken
comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
fuller ball outside the off stump. He looks to drive it and is beaten
leans forward and drives it to cover fielder
defends it to the leg side
good length ball outside the off stump. Siaka defends it to the off side
fuller ball outside the off stump. Siaka leans forward and lofts it over long-off for a huge six
comes forward and drives it to cover
comes forward and punches it back to the bowler
good length ball outside the off stump. Siaka leans forward and presents the full face of the bat as he defends
fuller ball outside the off stump. He drives it to mid-off
fuller ball outside the off stump. He drives it point. The ball bounces on the boot and pops up, allowing the batsmen to run across for a single
struck on the pads outside the line of the leg stump. They sneak a leg-bye in
turns it to deep square-leg for a couple
fuller ball outside the off stump. Vala leans forward and elegantly flicks it past the midwicket fielder for a boundary. PNG are getting a partnership going after the initial setbacks
good length ball outside the off stump. He moves across and defends it to the off side
comes forward and drives it to mid-on for a single
comes forward and defends it to  the off side

on the leg stump. Siaka glances it and a poor effort by the fielder at short fine-leg allows a boundary

short outside the off stump. Siaka defends it to the off side off the backfoot

steers it to third-man for a single
plays it with soft hands to off side and sets off for a single. The bowler oversteps and there was a late call for a no ball
free hit and Siaka capitalises on it. He slogs it over deep midwicket for a huge six
drives it to long-on for a single
good length ball on the middle stump. He turns it to the leg side for a single

turns it to the leg side for a single

down the leg side line. Off the pads to short fine-leg for a leg bye

good length ball outside the off stump. Vala looks to defend it and gets a faint edge to first slip. The drinks break does it! How many times have we seen a break in play leading to a wicket? Add this to that list
